001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.dao.UserRepository;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity.User;
005import java.net.URL;
006import java.util.UUID;
007import org.springframework.security.core.context.SecurityContextHolder;
008import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
009
010@Service
011public class UserService implements AbstractUserService {
012
013  private final UserRepository userRepository;
014
015  public UserService(UserRepository userRepository) {
016    this.userRepository = userRepository;
017  }
018
019  @Override
020  public User getCurrent() {
021    return (User) SecurityContextHolder.getContext()
022        .getAuthentication()
023        .getPrincipal();
024  }
025
026  @Override
027  public User get(UUID externalKey) {
028    return userRepository
029        .findByExternalKey(externalKey)
030        .orElseThrow();
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  public User getOrCreate(String oauthKey, String displayName) {
035    return userRepository
036        .findByOauthKey(oauthKey)
037        .orElseGet(() -> {
038          User user = new User();
039          user.setOauthKey(oauthKey);
040          user.setDisplayName(displayName);
041          // TODO: 2025-03-05 Set avatar
042          return userRepository.save(user);
043        });
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  public User update(User user) {
048    return userRepository
049        .findById(getCurrent().getId())
050        .map((u) -> {
051          String displayName = user.getDisplayName();
052          if (displayName != null) {
053            u.setDisplayName(displayName);
054          }
055          URL avatar = user.getAvatar();
056          if (avatar != null) {
057            u.setAvatar(avatar);
058          }
059          return userRepository.save(u);
060        })
061        .orElseThrow();
062  }
063
064}
